channel.title: CVE Feed for Vsourz Digital -- Responsive Slick Slider WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vsourz Digital -- Responsive Slick Slider WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-49852|2024-08-02T22:01:26.264Z -- vsourz%20digital -- responsive%20slick%20slider%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Vsourz Digital Responsive Slick Slider WordPress allows Code Injection.This issue affects Responsive Slick Slider WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Vsourz Digital Responsive Slick Slider WordPress allows Code Injection.This issue affects Responsive Slick Slider WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.
